LanguageData.SY_CBA.BaseScaleDesc: Scales the colonist bar If the number of colonists is greater than "colonists per row" * "maxmimum number of rows", this scaling will be ignored and the bar will be scaled down to fit the screen
LanguageData.SY_CBA.ColonistsPerRowDesc: Desired maximum number of colonists per row If the number of colonists is greater than "colonists per row" * "maxmimum number of rows", this limit will be ignored and the bar will be scaled down to fit the screen
